net.adamcin.oakpal.core

Class OrgJson

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.OrgJson

  • public final class OrgJson
extends Object
    Simple DSL for constructing org.json objects for ProgressCheckFactory configs using only three-letter identifiers.

    Recommend using import static net.adamcin.oakpal.core.OrgJson.*;

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OrgJson.Arr
      Constructs an array by iterating over a list of OrgJson.Value instances.
      static interface  OrgJson.ArrayConvertible
      Custom pojo types which should be usable within this DSL should implement this method to provide a JSONArray, which can be wrapped quickly by val(Object).
      static interface  OrgJson.As<TYPE>
      Defines a get method returns the constructed type parameter.
      static interface  OrgJson.Cursor
      Type which allows a different fluent style for building keys, i.e.
      static interface  OrgJson.HasValue
      Defines a method toValue which coalesces the underlying value to prevent over-wrapping by the val(Object) method.
      static class  OrgJson.Key
      Iterative key-value pair type for building OrgJson.Obj instances.
      static class  OrgJson.KeyCursor
      Cursor type originating from a call to key(String), and which therefore returns a lone OrgJson.Key for OrgJson.KeyCursor.val(Object).
      static class  OrgJson.Obj
      Constructs an object by iterating over a list of OrgJson.Key instances.
      static class  OrgJson.ObjCursor
      Cursor type originating from a call to OrgJson.Key.key(String) or OrgJson.Obj.key(String), and which therefore returns a new OrgJson.Obj with the newly-finished key appended internally.
      static interface  OrgJson.ObjectConvertible
      Custom pojo types which should be usable within this DSL should implement this method to provide a JSONObject, which can be wrapped quickly by val(Object).
      static class  OrgJson.Value
      Discrete value wrapper.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static OrgJson.Arr arr(Object... values)
      Creates an array with the provided values.

      Creates a key-value pair for use with obj(Key...).
      static OrgJson.Obj obj(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
      Create an object, and add all the keys from the provided json object to it.

      Create an object, and add all the keys from the provided map to it.
      static OrgJson.Obj obj(OrgJson.Key... keys)
      Create an object with the provided key-value pairs.
      static OrgJson.Value val(Object value)
      Ensures that an object reference is wrapped appropriately for use in the DSL.

    • Method Detail

      • val

        public static OrgJson.Value val(Object value)
        Ensures that an object reference is wrapped appropriately for use in the DSL.
        Parameters:
        value - null, an instance of OrgJson.HasValue, or some type supported by JSONObject.wrap(Object).
        Returns:
        a DSL-wrapped value

      • obj

        public static OrgJson.Obj obj(OrgJson.Key... keys)
        Create an object with the provided key-value pairs.
        Parameters:
        keys - 0-many key-value pairs
        Returns:
        a new obj

      • obj

        public static OrgJson.Obj obj(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
        Create an object, and add all the keys from the provided json object to it.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - a starting point
        Returns:
        a new obj

      • obj

        public static OrgJson.Obj obj(Map<?,?> map)
        Create an object, and add all the keys from the provided map to it.
        Parameters:
        map - a starting point
        Returns:
        a new obj

      • key

        public static OrgJson.Key key(String key,
                              Object value)
        Creates a key-value pair for use with obj(Key...). See also OrgJson.Obj.key(String, Object).
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value
        Returns:
        a key-value pair.

      • key

        public static OrgJson.KeyCursor key(String key)
        Begin a key-value pair without providing a value argument. val(Object) must be called to provide a value for the key-value pair before more keys are appended.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        a cursor waiting for a value

      • arr

        public static OrgJson.Arr arr(Object... values)
        Creates an array with the provided values.
        Parameters:
        values - the value elements of the array
        Returns:
        a new array
